name: The Backrooms Free Demo (VR)
description:
This is a free playable demo for 'The Backrooms' project that I'm working on.

It has Level 0 and no entities.

Enjoy exploring and see if you can find the Manila room.

If you don't get sound, try clicking on the game window on the computer. It's probably just not in focus. That's happened to me a few times, I'll try and fix it.
